Hmm, so you're going with the alternate reality option, huh?

That's fine. Now then, I have a few ideas as to the synopsis for the story.

Story 1: What Life Could've Been

Serena Tsukino, known to only a select few as the heroine Sailor Moon, was by her lonesome one day, wondering what her life would've been like if there was no NegaVerse, no Moon Kingdom, etcetera. But as she went to bed to sleep, she would soon wake up to a completely new world, very similar to her own, but with no NegaVerse to fight, no evil to destroy, she could be a normal teenage girl!

Well... except for one thing: She and other girls are now wearing some thick bulky diapers over a chubby, bottom heavy body. At first, Serena was in complete shock over seeing herself like this, but also...comfortable with it? Is this what she truly want, or will she want to return to her original world?

12221.content:
"What's this doing here?" Amy thought to herself, examining the strange infantile garments with confusion and mild curiosity. To make herself discreet, Amy quickly put everything back inside the package, and then hastily carried the box inside her home.

Fortunately, her mother was currently busy at the hospital as a Pediatrician, so Amy didn't have to worry about giving her an awkward explanation.

However, once she placed the package on the kitchen table, she suddenly noticed an envelope neatly hidden inside the box. "Hmm...wonder who this could be from?" Amy thought to herself, where she plucked the envelope from the box, opening it with a letter opener.

From there, she pulled out the contents of the envelope, reading what was written, as it said:

"Dear Amy Anderson,
Or...should I say, "Sailor Mercury". Don't fret, I am not here to reveal your identity to the public. In fact, I am approaching you with a rather ludicrous offer.

My name is Miki Sakamoto, and I am the C.E.O of Young At Heart Incorporated, a rather prestigious corporation that sells the necessities for members of the ABDL community. Now, as for my reasons for contacting you, it's quite simple...

You see, my daughter, Saiyuri Sakamoto, is a rather avid fan of the Sailor Scouts. More specifically, you can consider her your "Number 1 Fan". As a matter of fact, I distinctly remember that she goes to the same school as you and some of your Sailor Scout friends.

However, you could already tell that she is one of our primary models for our F.A.B product line. Anyway, to put it simply, she wants you to be, in her words, her "Super Duper Bestest Best Friend", with the condition that you wear the exact same type of clothes as her, diapers included. In exchange for such compliance, my company will not just keep your identity as Sailor Mercury a closely guarded scpecret, but we will also heavily compensate you with whatever you desire. That is, if you decided to accept this offer.

Sincerely,

Mrs. Miki Sakamoto,
C.E.O of Young At Heart Incorporated"

Suffice to say, Amy was certainly in shock at such a revelation. After all, she covered every expense to avoid having someone discover the identities of her and the other Sailor Scouts. Of course, she soon discovered the private phone number for Miki Sakamoto.

Overall, Amy needed to think her next move carefully.
12221.title: A Political Gesture of Goodwill

choices: Some time later, a blue limousine appears in front of Amy's home.
122211.content:
For the next hour or so, still getting over the initial shock that a regular person was able to discover her identity of Sailor Mercury, Amy contemplated on her next course of action. After all, she was known to be rather meticulous when it came to the secrets of the Sailor Scouts.

On one hand, she should accept the offer this "Miki Sakamoto" character was giving her, maybe negotiate a way that doesn't involve disclosing their heroic identities to the public.

But on the other hand, she wanted to instinctively decline such an embarrassing offer, which could result in recklessly allowing the Young At Heart Inc. C.E.O to disclose the identities of the Sailor Scouts to the public.

However, whilst thinking on her decision, she recognized the name "Saiyuri Sakamoto". Amy would always voluntarily assist with the girl's homework as a tutor. Saiyuri was a rather "hefty" girl, easily weighing in at little over 300 pounds in weight. And yet, Amy always found Saiyuri's initial behavior to be a little..."childish" for her age.

Though, now Amy knew why Saiyuri behaved like a little girl: Probably because it was a Fantasy of her's.

Eventually, two hours had passed, and Amy soon made up her mind...

She went over to her family's cellular phone, dialed in the number written in the letter as a way to contact Mrs. Sakamoto. It rang for a brief moment or two, where Amy then heard a matronly woman's voice respond, "...Hello? Who is this?"

"Hello, is this Mrs. Miki Sakamoto? This is Amy Anderson speaking." Amy replied, confirming who she was to the called individual.

"Oh! Good to hear from you, Amy! So, I take it that your reason for calling me is that you want to accept my offer, then?" Mrs. Sakamoto chirped, her tone changing from confused to chipper in a heartbeat. From there, Amy exhaled a deep sigh in response and answered, "*sigh* ...Yes, Mrs. Sakamoto. I'm calling to accept your offer. Just...Is this call being recorded?"

"No~! Absolutely not, my dear! I wouldn't stoop myself to such a dreadful level of depravity, Amy. I take it that you are already "properly dressed" in the attire I have sent you, my dear?" Miki queried, causing Amy to look back at the package full of infantile garments about her size.

Then, she returned her attention back to who she was speaking to and replied, "Oh! Um... No, I haven't, Mrs. Sakamoto. I...I believe they're too big to fit on me properly."

"Oops! I'm terribly sorry, dear Amy. But not to worry, I will make sure you *ahem* "properly" fit into your new attire. I shall arrange some transportation for you. Look for a blue limousine." Mrs. Sakamoto chirped, where she then ended the conversation by hanging up the phone, thus ending the call.

== 2 & A Half Minutes Later... ==

Once she had finished getting dressed (much to her embarrassment), Amy carefully stepped out of her home, quickly looking to her left and right as to see if there was no one else besides her and the limousine chauffeur. Fortunately, she was in the clear, as the chauffeur then politely opened the rear door for her, gesturing her to enter inside the vehicle, to which she reluctantly complied.

Although, she certainly wasn't accustomed to the sheer thickness of the diaper, especially since it was intentionally produced for someone much fatter in mind, since she occasionally had to pull the infantile garment upwards to avoid it slipping down to her ankles, despite her outfit's comfort and functionality.

Once she was inside the limousine, the chauffeur soon returned to the driver's seat, and proceeded to drive towards the intended destination for his escort.

Upon sitting comfortably inside the limousine, the chauffeur soon pressed a few buttons, which revealed a large set of plattered foods and cuisines laid out before Amy, where she then asked, "Um, excuse me, mister? What is with all the food here?"

"...The food is for you, Ms. Mizuno." He flatly stated, keeping his eyes on the street due to his occupation. Confused as to what he meant, Amy shot a confused look at him and asked, "...And...What does this entail?"

"...It is a request from Mrs. Sakamoto that you eat as much food as possible before your *ahem* playdate with her daughter, Ms. Saiyuri Sakamoto. That's all she said." He bluntly confirmed, which Amy acknowledged that the chauffeur was clearly on a strict "Need-To-Know" basis.

And as Amy sat back down her seat, she felt and heard the diaper crinkle audibly, causing her to blush profusely. She contemplated on her next move whilst she thought "...I got a feeling that this Mrs. Sakamoto wants to fatten me up or something..."

With little choice on the matter at hand, she stabbed a fork into some stirred beef, propping up to her mouth as she mentally thought, "But...It seems there's little choice in my predicament. *sigh* I just hope all of this nonsense is worth the trouble."

And with that, as she took a small bite out of the stirred beef, her tongue made contact with the cooked cuisine. From there, as it descended down her throat, the meal was proven to be...

Story #1: Tesla, The Robo-Nanny
(Inspired by Furaffinity user "Jaymanney4life" and his original character, MB-02 "Tesla")
A few weeks after the events of Sailor Moon R, there have been a string case of missing girls from Serena, Amy, and Lita's school, all of which have been recently reported missing. However, while Serena was going about her usual business, both Amy and Lita, the Brains and Brawn of the Sailor Scouts, decided to investigate these strange disappearances of their female classmates all by themselves. However, little do they even realize, but they have become the new "charges" of MB-02, codenamed "Tesla", a military-grade female android that was somehow reprogrammed to be the ultimate robot nanny! Will Amy and Lita be able to overcome this newly unique adversary? Or will Sailor Mercury and Sailor Jupiter be stuck as big fat diapered Sailor Scouts for the rest of their days?

151322212111.content:
(Note: This is my version of events after the alternate ending of "Renama-ma" on DeviantArt)

They say "a lot can happen in a few months". And to the stoic female vixen Digimon known as Renamon, the human quote wasn't far from the truth.

It has already been approximately 5 months since Rika was rescued and the confrontation with Witchmon, as Renamon slept soundly alongside her diapered Tamer. However, Rika Nonaka wasn't the only one inside the bedroom who was wearing a pair of ludicrously thick diapers, for Renamon was now currently wearing a thick crinkly diaper around her fur-coated waist, courtesy of the injuries she received during her battle with the crazed Witchmon. Although, despite now wearing the thickly padded undergarments like her beloved Tamer, Renamon was still considered as "Renama-ma" to the diapered Rika.

But with the D-Reaper completely annihilated and the Digimon now peacefully coexisting with humans, both Rika and Renamon now had a lot of free time on their hands. And boy, did such "free time" explicitly flaunt itself on both Digimon and Tamer, not just in their behavior, but also their waistlines as well. Over the past few months, Renamon developed a habit of cooking plentiful meals for her baby Rika, which were not just delicious, but also surprisingly fattening as well, causing Rika's lithe and petite body to plump up in a noticeable fashion, complete with thicker thighs, plumper butt, slightly larger breasts, a slightly fuller face, and a small but noticeable paunch of a belly pooching outward against the waistband of her thick diaper.

Of course, Rika Nonaka wasn't the only one who was becoming a bit fatter, as Renamon was quickly catching up to the diapered Tamer in the "body filling up with adipose" department, due to the anthropomorphic fox Digimon test-tasting much of her own handmade delicacies. Then again, Renamon has heard of the phrase, "Never trust a skinny chef", so one would say that Renamon took those words to heart, both figuratively and literally. In turn, this gave Renamon a measly 10 to 20 pound head start on Rika when it came to which of the two of them was the fattest one of the diapered duo.

--------

Fast forward to present day, as both Renamon and Rika were sleeping soundly. But as the sun's rays dimly shone through the windows into the bedroom, it slowly began to stir the plump diapered Renamon from her slumber, sluggishly stretching her slightly chubby furry arms while exhaling a long yawn. From there, she rubbed the sleep from her eyes, as she looked down at the unconscious Rika, who was still in a state of peaceful slumber, sucking on a baby blue adult-sized pacifier.

In truth, their weights weren't the only noticeable signs of change to the plump diapered Digimon and Tamer, for Rika's bedroom now had a more infantile atmosphere to it, complete with a brand new bed that was equipped with custom-built crib bars, as Rika was currently a fleece Renamon-themed onesie, which had a yellow hood with cute floppy Renamon ears on it, along with a pair of Renamon hind paw booties equipped on her feet, all while the overall ensemble did little to conceal how adorably plump the once cold-hearted Rika had become.

Overall, Renamon couldn't help but display a warm motherly smile toward seeing her Tamer dressed up in such an adorably cute and infantile display, as Renamon gently rubbed her left paw-like hand along the side of Rika's arm and slightly tubby waist in a soothing manner. Although she initially didn't want to become a mother, the plump fox Digimon was sure glad she was one now, taking care of Rika as if she was her own Renamon Kit.
151322212111.title: The Life of a Big Baby Digimon & Tamer

"Rika-chan, it's time to wake up~~" Renamon said in a sing-song tone, which was fortunately successful in stirring the diapered Rika from her peaceful slumber, as the chubby infantile Tamer slowly rose up to a sitting position on the bed, stretching her arms outward and emitting a loud yawn in the process.

"Ermmm... *yawn* Good morning, Renama-ma." Rika said, turning her hooded head to look at her Digimon caretaker with a reassured smile on her face. Shortly after speaking, Renamon then used her right paw-like hand to pat Rika's thickly diapered behind a few times in a teasing manner, as each pat emitted these loud crinkling sounds from Rika's diaper. Of course, this easily snapped Rika out of her almost gluttonous stupor, as the infantile Tamer yelped out an audible "EEP!" in response, where she then saw Renamon waddle off to the side, which easily showed off the fox Digimon's own thickly padded diaper as well.

"Renama-ma! You scared me!" Rika yelped, wiping her mouth clean of drool with a left arm, as she gently rubbed her thickly padded diapered butt with a right hand in response to her motherly Digimon's surprise coddling. "*giggle* My sincerest apologies, Rika-chan. I find you to be rather adorable when you're drooling like an infant for a minute there." Renamon replied, as she sat herself down at the table with her own plate of blueberry pancakes and a glass full of orange juice. From there, Rika soon followed suit, as she waddled toward the opposite chair and sat down alongside Renamon, hearing the audible crinkle of her thick bulky diaper from merely sitting down.

But then, just as she was about to dig in, Renamon swiftly stopped her, as she tied an adult-sized bib around Rika's neck. And with that, Rika began to greedily cut into the stack of pancakes, as she then began to devour mouthful after mouthful of delicious blueberry flapjack goodness, tasting the syrup-coated morsels with each deliberate bite. Of course, due to Renamon's refined cooking skills, the infantile Rika had slowly but surely developed a noticeably increased appetite, which in turn, resulted in the diapered Tamer's plump and softer physique, a far cry from Rika's original but petite physiology.

Although, Rika wasn't the only one binging on blueberry pancakes, as Renamon was devouring equally large bites as well, only with much more etiquette. But eventually, after roughly 45 minutes of eating, both Rika and Renamon were able to finish off each of their plates, which resulted in both the diapered Digimon and Tamer to have quite the stuffed stomachs, causing their bellies to noticeably bloat outward by an inch or two. "Uuugh... So... Full..." Rika moaned, as she felt her body still digesting the food she has consumed. Fortunately, Renamon wrapped her slightly plump arms around Rika, and began to lightly pat the plump diapered Tamer's back until... UUURRRP!!" Rika burped, which released the excess gas inside her taut stomach, giving her a bit of relief from a overly stuffed belly, courtesy of her Renama-ma.

"There now. Feeling better?" Renamon asked, as Rika nodded in confirmation and answered, "Yes. Thank you, Renama-ma!" "*giggle* Aww, you're welcome, my little Rika-chan." Renamon replied, who emitted a light burp as well moments later, excusing herself for such rude behavior. However, out of curiosity, Renamon then spoke toward the chubby infantile Tamer and asked, "So, Rika-chan... I take it that you have something planned for the day then?" Obviously, Rika indeed had something planned for today, because...
151322212111111.title: Renama-ma's Blueberry Flapjacks

1513222121111111.content:
"*giggle* Of course I do, Renama-ma! I'm inviting a few of my friends over today." Rika chirped, looking rather ecstatic at the prospect, as Renamon felt quite pleased with her loving charge's behavior.

Playing coyly with the chubby diapered Tamer, Renamon put on a coyly quizzical gesture, pressing a mildly plump paw-like index finger upon her slightly fuller about and teasingly quipped, "*giggle* Well, I'm sure that sounds quite lovely, my cute little Rika-chan. So, when will your playmates arrive?"

"Oh, pretty soon, I hope!" Rika giggled, playing with her portable game device as a minor distraction. Sure, she and Renamon have decided to embrace the Big Baby lifestyle, but that didn't mean relieving themselves of adolescent and adult activities such as playing video games or watching scary movies. But still, they certainly weren't complaining.

But then, just as Rika had beaten the game's boss, her cell phone started ringing, picking it up and seeing that she received a text from one of her friends, Miku, which read:

"Hey, Rika-Baby! Ready for the playdate at ur house?"

From there, Rika casually tossed aside her game device and rapidly texted:

"Hella yeah! R u bringing the diapers? The huge ones?"

Shortly after sending the text, a few minutes passed by until a reply came back, which read:

"Oh yeah! We're gonna b wearing diapees so thick we'll have 2 waddle. Also, Sayaka, Rei, and I r bring our Digimon with us. Gatomon's so excited to come over. C u soon, Rika-Baby! Tell Renama-ma I said hi!"

Upon hearing of this, Rika soon squealed with ecstatic glee and excitement, akin to a toddler receiving a brand new toy or given a big lollipop.

Upon hearing her Tamer's excitement, Renamon, who soon wetted her diaper moments ago whilst washing the dishes, displayed a motherly smile and chortled, "Ooooh! It sounds like someone is rather excited today."

"I am excited, Renama-ma! Miku, Rei, and Sayaka are bringing their Digimon over. He-heee!" Rika retorted, who did a little childish dance, hopping a little, causing her chubby diapered butt to bob up and down whilst she did so, as the thickly padded undergarment crinkle loudly in the process.

Of course, Renamon soon found herself a little excited herself, especially since she'll be seeing Rika's friends' Digimon again, which were a female Gatomon, Biyomon, and a female Dorumon. Sure, she was more accustomed to seeing Guilmon, Terriermon, Impmon, and the other Tamer Digimon, but socializing with other like-minded Digimon was undoubtedly not a bad thing for her.

Once she was finished with drying the dishes, Renamon soon tended to her now damp diaper, speaking to her favorite Tamer and said, "I'll be changing myself into a clean diaper if you need me, my little Rika. Is that alright with you?"

"*giggle* Not at all, Renama-ma! You wear diapees as well." Rika childishly quipped, giggling with contentful glee at how Renamon is diapered like her.

But as Rika preoccupied herself with watching some cartoons on TV, she soon heard the doorbell ring, which prompted her to get up and toddle over to the door. Upon opening the door, she was soon greeted by...
1513222121111111.title: Inviting Some Diapered Friends

choices: Chocolate chip cookies shaped into fox heads.

15132221211111111.content:
But as Rika preoccupied herself with watching some cartoons on TV, she soon heard the doorbell ring, which prompted her to get up and toddle over to the door. Upon opening the door, Rika was soon greeted by none other than her aforementioned playmates, as Miku swiftly yet lightly tackled the diapered Rika with a friendly childish hug whilst she gleefully squealed, "Rika-Baby!!"

"*giggle* It's good to see you too, Miku!" Rika replied, wrapping her slightly chubby arms around her equally diapered friend, to which Rei then teasingly quipped, "Hey! What about us, Rika-Baby?"

From there, Rika peered over behind the mildly chubbier diaper-wearing girl to see both Rei and Sayaka toddling inside the house, along with their Digimon companions, which strangely enough, seemed to be wearing some diapers of their own as well, along with some equally adorable ensembles!

Miku's Gatomon undoubtedly had the most frilly outfit of the trio of Digimon, equipped in a baby pink onesie with a poofy frilly short skirt around the waist area of the outfit, which did little to conceal the bulk of her respective diaper due to her stubby legs.

Meanwhile, Rei's Biyomon, known to be the more naive of the trio, wore what appeared to be a pair of fluffy footsie pajamas, with said footsies shaped to better fit Biyomon's avian feet. Much like Gatomon, there was the unmistakable crinkly bulge of a diaper underneath the outfit ensemble, complete with Biyomon's tail feathers jutting out from the rear of the infantile clothes.

And finally, last but certainly not least, there was the metaphorical "Mammothmon In The Room"; Sayaka's female Dorumon. Out of the three dog-sized Digimon, Dorumon undoubtedly had quite the thickest diaper of the three, much to Dorumon's utter reluctance, judging from what Rika could see from the begrudging expression on Dorumon's snout, who also bore quite the embarrassed blush.

Though, as for her outfit ensemble, it was certainly a custom-tailored ensemble due to Dorumon's saurian-esque physique, as Dorumon huffed a frustratingly embarrassed demeanor, her arms crossed in a fidgety manner due to how much the absurdly thick diaper crinkled and explicitly forced her stance into a profound waddling gait. And to make matters even more embarrassing for the tomboyish Digimon, Dorumon was put in a frilly baby blue dress, where the frilly skirt trim was so short she was unable to hide her diaper whatsoever.

Suffice to say, Rika couldn't help but let out a light chuckle at Dorumon's embarrassing predicament, then coyly said, "*giggle* That's quite the diapee you have on, Dorumon!"

In response, Dorumon blushed even more until she was a beet red instead of a mauve hue, her hind legs bending inwards out of timid meekness, to which the embarrassed Digimon abruptly rebuffed, "Sh-Sh-Shush it, human! I-I-It isn't like I wa-wa-wanted to we-wear something so...So--"

"--Infantile? Oh hush now, Dorumon. You look absolutely adorable!" Sayaka interjected, to which she promptly committed a few audible pats on her Dorumon's diapered posterior, which made the Digimon quiver in quite a timid mess, as the rest of the group toddled inside Rika's house, with the three girls wearing quite an assortment of babyish garments.

And as both Miku and Rika promptly severed their friendly embrace, Rika could easily see that Rei was currently carrying a total of three large grocery-sized bags stuffed with the diapers that they mentioned over the text messaging, to which a smile grew upon Rika's slightly fuller face.

From there, as they toddled their way deeper into the Nonaka household, Rei spoke toward Rika and asked, "...Say, speaking of diapered Mons, where's your Renama-ma at, anyway?"

"Oh, I figured you'd mentioned me quite so soon, Rei-Rei. *giggle*" Renamon cheekily quipped, whose voice originated from where Rika last saw her diapered Renama-ma; The kitchen. As the group made it to the kitchen area, Renamon had just finished up making a fresh batch of treats, as her overly-padded diaper jutted out from the pink frilly apron she donned sometime ago.

From there, they noticed something rather noticeable on the vulpine Digimon; the front of her bulky diaper was taking on a light yellow tint to it's patterned design, to which Miku cheekily joked, "*giggle* Well, looks like Renama-ma certainly needs a change!"

"*giggle* My apologies, Miku-chan. I was so busy prepping a snack for you all that I wasn't paying attention." Renamon chirped, as she put on some oven mitts to pull out the fresh tray of baked treats from the oven, which revealed to be full of...
15132221211111111.title: Diapered Digi-Pals!

choices: A purple fleece onesie with a buttoned diaper flap.
A pair of poofy footsie pajamas.
151322212111111111.content:
In her mittened hands, Renamon pulled out a tray full of fresh warm cookies. However, upon closer inspection, as a plentiful whiff of steam rose from the baked goods, the cookies were conveniently shaped in the form of a Renamon head, with yellow and white icing plastered on the crust.

"Wow! That looks really good!" Miku quipped, her nostrils already catching the cookies' scent with little effort, as Renamon giggled a little in response, then posthumously replied, "Why thank you, Miku. I figured I should take up a hobby, now that there weren't anymore battles in the future. And, well... As you can clearly see, I've apparently taking up baking as a hobby. *giggle* Pretty ironic, isn't it?"

"I'll say! Considering what Rika-chan told us about you prior to her coming out, I wouldn't believe it either!" Miku chirped, the smell of a fresh batch of cookies becoming rather tempting to say the least, where she then meekly asked, "...M-Mind if I--"

"--Have one? *giggle* Why of course, Miku-chan! I made all of this for Rika and her friends, haven't I?" Renamon cutely interjected, giving Miku permission to take one of the Renamon cookies, to which Miku voluntarily plucked one from the tray, biting off the cookie's left ear in the process.

From there, Renamon toddled over to the living room coffee table where the others were sitting, casually placing the still-warm tray upon it's surface, where she then matronly chirped, "Here you go, girls! A nice, fresh batch of cookies~! Now, if you'll excuse, it seems I'll be needing a change soon. Don't cause too much of a ruckus, do you hear?"

"Sure, Renama-ma!" Rika chuckled, as the rest of the diapered entourage toddled over to the couch for a midday snack before lunch, while the chubby diapered Renamon cutely toddled back into the bedroom, most likely to get changed into a fresh clean diaper no doubt.

"*sigh* I must admit...this new lifestyle Rika and I have chosen..." Renamon thought, stripping herself of the adorable frilly apron she wore and discarding it onto a coat rack, passing by a full-body mirror, thus getting a good glimpse of her now chubbier form. Momentarily, she stopped to view her reflection, slowly twisting and turning get at every angle as she mentally continued, "*giggle* If only Impmon could see me now..."

To the left of the mirror, Renamon could easily pick out the stacks of diaper packages neatly stacked together on the carpet floor, a cheeky but blushing curve of her lips appearing in the process, as she pulled out a thick bulky pair of Digimon diapers from an opened package, as another thought slithered into her mind, noting her newly acquired pudge as she traced her baby fat bump with a calm paw-like hand as she self-noted, "...But still, I never thought in a million Digi-Cycles would I be "letting myself go", as the humans would say."

Looking back onto the current topic of notice, Renamon could clearly feel how warm her wet diaper was at this point, patting it once with a free hand and noted, "Well... I guess I better get myself changed then."

It had become a regular routine for Renamon, given how she was now rendered incontinent from her battle with a crazed Witchmon sometime ago. And yet, it felt a little bit of a blessing in disguise, as it were. Turns out some big fancy corporation was interested in making diapers for Digimon, and they approached her with an offer to be both their model and tester for their products, hence how the two could afford the infantile renovations, one would say.

==1 Minute and 25 Seconds Later...==

Fortunately, Renamon was able to change herself into a fresh diaper with relative ease, as she double to triple-checked to make sure she was properly secured in the crinkly puffy undergarment. Suffice to say, due to the ludicrous bulk of said undergarments, Renamon had already gotten accustomed to toddling and waddling about like a human toddler or infant would. Though, she wouldn't admit this loud, but she actually liked the way the diapers felt pressing her digitgrade legs apart. In a way, she almost wished they gave her some thicker ones to wear.

Once she was finished inspecting herself, Renamon toddled over to the nearby closet to choose an outfit to wear for the day, which ultimately came down to...
151322212111111111.title: A Tray of Renama-ma Cookies

1551111.content:
It had been three weeks since Beast Boy started diapering Robin every night before he went to bed and changing his wet diapers in the morning times when he woke up. It had been difficult to hide it from the other Titans but they somehow pulled it off. Just recently however it had gotten a lot harder as Robin's condition had gotten worse and he was starting to wet himself in the middle of the day now. They had both decided it was for the best if he wore some form of protection during the day, just in case, so now Robin was wearing Pull-Ups full time, except for at night when he would wear thicker night time diapers so he didn't leak. Because of the change in Robin's condition Beast Boy was now caring for him 24/7, changing his diapers whenever he needed. Robin could probably do it himself but every time Beast Boy told him that he refused stating that the other teen did a much better job, Beast Boy really didn't mind though, he kind of enjoyed it, it made him feel responsible and needed.

"I think we may need to start putting you in diapers full time, Robby. These Pull-Ups just aren't cutting it anymore." Beast Boy said to Robin, using a nickname he had started calling him. Robin laid on his bed on top of a changing mat as Beast Boy changed his nearly dripping Pull-Up.

"Mm'kay" Robin said, his thumb finding it's way into his mouth, a habit he had picked just recently. Robin let his eyes slip closed as Beast Boy slid a thick diaper under him and quickly powdered his bum before taping the diaper shut. He watched Robin suck on his thumb with worry in his eyes, he had been noticing his friends condition getting progressively worse. He was more needy, always wanting to be with Beast Boy, he couldn't go to bed by himself anymore, Beast Boy had to stay with him until he fell asleep, and his day time accidents were getting even worse, in fact Beast Boy couldn't even remember the last time he saw Robin use a toilet.

There was one thing Beast Boy couldn't deny though, Robin enjoyed being taken care of. He wasn't sure why, but every time he changed Robin's diapers he just looked so at peace and calm and care-free; the total opposite of how usually was. He had no clue where Robin's new personality was coming from, but if he enjoyed it as much as Beast Boy did than he wanted to make sure he was happy as could be. Beast Boy looked at Robin, the teen was sound asleep in nothing but his diaper, sucking on his thumb. He smiled before covering him up and turning off the lights so he could nap.

While Robin was asleep Beast Boy went to the store to go get some more supplies for him since he was running low.
1551111.title: Beastboy babies Robin

15511111.content:
Once Beast Boy had come home for the store he headed straight for Robin's room to go check on his baby. He was glad that all the Titans were away for the week so that he and Robin could have the whole tower to themselves. Beast Boy walked down the long hallway and stopped in front of the sliding metal door that lead into Robin's room, he quickly punched in the code and the door slid open so he could walk in. He turned on the light and set down his bag as he walked over to Robin to wake him up.

"Robby, baby time to wake up. Nap time's over." Beast Boy said in his baby voice, he wasn't really sure when he learned or even when he started using it but he couldn't talk to Robin any other way now, it just wouldn't feel right. Robin stirred slightly and his eyes opened to see Beast Boy looking down at him, the teen grinned big at him but his smile quickly turned into a frown and he started to whimper, tears forming in his eyes. Beast Boy noticed this and looked at him sympathetically.

"What's wrong baby?" Beast Boy asked, wiping away a few tears that had spilled over.

"I-I made a-a poopy." Robin said in between sobs. It was then that the smell hit Beast Boy's nose and he cringed, he had absolutely no idea how he missed that smell. The green titan pulled back the covers to reveal that Robin had indeed made a mess in his diaper.
15511111.title: Robin stays asleep the whole time

155111111.content:
"Oh baby, it's okay. This is why BB makes you wear diapers, 'member? So you don't get it on anything else." Beast boy comforted him, wiping away his tears and using his baby talk. Robin's stuck his thumb in his mouth and sniffled nodding his head, when Beast Boy saw this he remembered something and reached down into his bag that was on the floor and pulled out a black and red pacifier.

"Here Robby, suck on this instead. we need to kick that thumb sucking habit, it's not good for your little fingers." He said as he pulled Robin's thumb out of his mouth and quickly replaced it with the pacifier. Shockingly, Robin didn't put up any protest at all, he quickly started sucking on the pacifier and even stopped sniffling. Beast boy helped Robin lay back and reached into his bag to pull out the necessary supplies to change Robin.

"Okay, let's get you out of this messy diaper. What do you say?" Beast boy said cheerfully, Robin just nodded his head a giggled. Beast Boy undid the tapes on Robins diaper and pulled it down, he started wiping Robin's bottom and around his crotch before he balled up the diaper and threw it away. The younger teen pulled out a new, more babyish diaper than the plain white one Robin had been wearing, this one had pictures of cute little teddy bears on it and was thicker than the ones Robin had been wearing. Beast Boy quickly put the diaper on him and applied baby powder before taping it up snug around his waist. Beast boy reached into his bag and pulled out a baby blue onesie to put on Robin since he couldn't put the boy's tights on over his diaper. Beast boy pulled it over Robin's head and snapped the crotch together before helping Robin sit up.

"I hungy Bee." Robin said around the pacifier and as if on cue Robin's stomach growled. That was another thing Beast Boy had noticed about Robin was that his speech and vocabulary had become very juvenile. Just recently his motor skills had gotten the same way, Robin could barely turn door knobs now, much less tie his shoe on his own. Robin stood up and took Beast Boy's hand as they walked to the kitchen, Beast Boy didn't miss the fact that Robin was practicly leaning on him the whole walk.

"Okay, let's get something to fill up that tummy of yours." Beast Boy said.
155111111.title: Beast Boy Comforts Him

1551111111.content:
Beast Boy walked over to the fridge and pulled out a can of Gerber baby food. Just like his motor skills, Robin's taste in food had been decreasing as well, if it wasn't in super small pieces or mashed up he wouldn't eat it. Beast Boy popped open the can of baby food and grabbed a plastic spoon as he scooped out a spoon full and stuck it into Robin's mouth. The sixteen year old hero smiled and quickly swallowed the mush, opening his mouth back up for more. Beast Boy chuckled and gave him another spoon full.

"You really like this stuff, don't you?" He said as he fed him some more. How Robin had managed to get baby food all the way up to his forehead was a mystery but Beast Boy laughed as he finished feeding Robin and began wiping his face with a warm wash cloth.

"I firsty, Bee." Robin stated simply as he hopped down from the chair.

"Are you? Well I guess will just have to fix that then." Beast Boy said as he walked over to the fridge and pulled out a bottle of baby formula he had put in there earlier. Beast Boy figure robin could probably use the nutrients since he wasn't eating adult food anymore. Beast Boy picked up the older teen, a feat he was proud to say he mastered, and rested him on his hip as he walked towards the large couch. 1553321.title: Bleach

155332111.content:
Beep Beep Beep

Ichigo moaned and rolled over in his bed as he slapped his hand on top of his alarm clock, stopping the persistent noise that told him it was time to start another day. The ginger rolled back over and looked up at the ceiling not wanting to get out of bed, he just wanted to lay there and sleep, but he knew his sisters would come to tell him breakfast was ready soon.

As Ichigo started to move around he felt the warmness at his crotch and the damp feeling he was all to used to. Ichigo shot up in bed and threw back the sheets staring in awe at what he saw. It had happened again. He had wet his bed for the third time this week. The teen threw his head back and groaned, as he sat up and rested against the frame of his bed.

'I really don't need this! It's already bad enough that I'm failing school and I have to keep up with being a Soul Reaper without having to deal with this too! Why does this keep happening anyway? I just don't get it! I've never had problems like this before...' Ichigo continued to think to himself as he stripped his bed of his sheets and changed out of his pajama pants and boxers. Ichigo jumped whenever he heard Yuzu knocking on his door.

“Ichigo, breakfast is almost ready. Are you awake?” Yuzu said knocking on the door and calling her older brother.
155332111.title: Ichigo

choices: Ichigo goes to the store to buy what he needs
1553321111.content:
Yuzu was about to go in and check on Ichigo but she stopped when she heard him yell back at her.

“I'll be down in a minute! Don't come in though. I-I'm not descent.” Ichigo yelled to her as he panicked to find words that would keep his kid-sister out of his room. He really didn't need her to find out about this. Yuzu had a tendency to overreact a little when it came to stuff like this, a trait that she picked up from their dad unfortunately. Not to mention if she found out she would probably tell their dad and that would make things horrible.

Ichigo gathered everything up and walked over to his door, since Yuzu hadn't said anything he assumed she had gone back down stairs. Ichigo poked his head out the door and checked to see if anyone was around before sneaking out into the hall and rushing over to the washing machine. As soon as Ichigo had thrown the soiled laundry into the wash he ran back to his room and quickly flipped the mattress over and remade his bed, he didn't have time to worry about cleaning it right now.

Ichigo grabbed the air freshener off of his desk and sprayed a generous amount into the air, making sure to spray a little more by his bed. He started keeping some after the accidents began so that he didn't have to worry about his room smelling of urine all the time. Satisfied, Ichigo put down the aerosol and sat down on his bed. The part time Soul Reaper sighed loudly and rested his head in his hands, weaving his fingers into his bright orange hair.

'I need to figure out something, I can't keep this up. I hardly get any sleep anymore, this is getting harder to hide from everyone, and it's just making me even more stressed... I really don't want to do this, but I-I guess it's time I looked into some protection. I was hoping it would just go away, but that obviously isn't gong to happen. Crap, this sucks!' Ichigo got up off of his bed and made his way downstairs to eat breakfast, afterward he would go down to the local convenience store and grab some protection.

He was happy it was a Saturday, otherwise he wouldn't be able to go get what he needed after breakfast. It was the perfect time to go, his dad would be starting work for the day and Karin and Yuzu would be too busy worrying about the mornings chores to pay attention to him. After Ichigo had sat down with his sisters and began eating he noticed that his dad was no where to be seen.

“Where's dad? He's not gonna eat with us?” Ichigo asked curiously.

“He said he was skipping breakfast for today, he had to go run some errands before he had to be back here for work.” Karin said semi-monotonously as she ate her rather large breakfast.

“Oh, okay. So we probably won't see him until tonight, huh?” Ichigo asked trying to hold in his excitement.

“Probably not. He sounded like he was going to be gone awhile.” Yuzu chimed in, finishing up her breakfast and collecting everyone's plates.

'Great, that makes this an even easier job now that I don't have to worry about dad not being here to get suspicious.' Ichigo thought to himself as he got up and went into his room to get ready to leave. He told the girls he was going to pick up a few things before he left and they let him leave without any questions, for which Ichigo was grateful.
1553321111.title: Ichigo convinces Yuzu to leave

choices: Ichigo runs into his friends from school
15533211111.content:
Ichigo quickly made his way over to the corner store to see what he could find, he really didn't know what he was looking for other than he needed some kind of night time protection. The Soul Reaper walked into the store and avoided eye contact with the perky teenage cashier that greeted him as he made a beeline for the personal care aisle. He looked up and down the aisle not seeing anything remotely related to what he wanted, so he moved on to the next aisle over. After about three aisles Ichigo finally found what he was looking for. Well, almost...

'None of these are for adults. None. You would think there would be at least one package of adult... diapers.' Ichigo thought to himself, still not wanting to admit that was what he was here for; diapers. He looked over the aisle for a second time, and then a third, still nothing. The closest thing he could find to what he needed was a package of Huggies brand Pull-Ups. They were the largest size that they made, so they would probably fit him well, but there was no way he was going to humiliate himself even more by buying those. Adult diapers were bad enough, but this was just torture. Ichigo scanned the aisle one last time, hoping to find a package in the back that he missed, but no such luck.

'I cannot go another night without...something. It looks like I don't have a choice...' Ichigo sighed loudly and grabbed the package of Pull-Ups and some rash cream and wipes and made his way over to the register. He set all of the items down on the counter so that the cashier could ring them up, Ichigo just watched awkwardly as she placed them into a bag, grateful he didn't know her personally.
15533211111.title: Ichigo goes to the store to buy what he needs

choices: One of Ichigo's sisters notices his diaper
155332111111.content:
As soon as the teenaged Soul Reaper had left the not-so-small corner store he made a direct path back for his house. It was on that path home that he noticed a familiar tightness in his stomach, so he picked up the pase a little to get home faster and get to a bathroom.

As Ichigo was walking home as briskly as possible the sensation in his lower stomach kept getting stronger, painfully so. He tried to ignore it but was almost unbarable. Suddenly, and without warning, Ichigo's bladder just let go, and the young teenager stood just watching in shame and emmbarrasment as he wet himself in broad daylight. He was unable to stop it and when he was finally finished he simply looked around not knowing what to do. He felt like he was on the verge of tears, and he was lucky there was no one around to see or he might have actually been crying.

Ichigo took the bag that was in his hands and quickly covered up his front area with it as he made a mad dash back to his house. The orange haired male opened the door slightly and peaked his head inside to make sure no one was around before he darted inside and went straight up to his room.

Once he made it inside safely he shut and locked the door and threw the package of Pull-Ups onto the bed. Ichigo sat down and threw his head into his hands as he silently sobbed.

'What is happening to me?! I'm turning into a mess!' Ichigo thought to himself rather pittyfully. He stood up and began to strip himself of the soiled garments, throwing them into a corner for now. Ichigo went to open his dresser to grab a new pair of boxers but had a sudden thought.

"I have no idea if this going to happen again, hopefully not, but I can't afford to ruin anymore clothes..." Ichigo said outloud as he reluctantly grabbed the bag of Pull-Ups and used his teeth to rip it open.

The boy slid one of the thin diapers out of the package and looked it over, turning it in his hands and feeling it. It was mostly blue and had the character Buzz Lightyear from Toy Story on it, it even had a rocket ship on the crotch that dissappered when it was wet. Ichigo breathed out slowly before opening it up and stepping into it, he pulled it up around his waist and made sure it fit right everywhere. It fit his frame surprisingly well and was rather comfortable. A light pink blush formed on his cheeks as he saw what he looked like in the mirror, the teen quickly pulled on his pants and tried to move on like it was just any other day.
155332111111.title: Ichigo has an accident

1553321111111.content:
The rest of the day went by fairly slow and uneventfully, the only other accident Ichigo had happened almost immdiately after lunch. The boy simply went upstairs and changed the soiled Pull-Up in silence.

The Kurosaki family had just finished their supper for the night and Ichigo was walking back up to his room when he heard a very faint beeping noise, one that he was very familiar with. As he entered his room he looked on top of his night stand and, sure enough, his Soul Reaper pass was flashing, indicating there was a Hollow around. The ginger male sighed and grabbed the badge, pressing it to his chest. His human body fell limp to the floor and Ichigo, now dressed in his Soul Reaper clothes, stood in it's place.

Ichigo picked up his body and placed it in the bed and under the blankets before he hopped out his bedroom window and ran off in search of the Hollow.

It wasn't until Ichigo ran into an open field in a park area that he saw the beast. The Hollow easily towered five feet over Ichigo, it had large feet and a long beefy tail, thick tentacles were in the place of it's arms. It's head was small in comparison to the rest of it's body and it doned a Hollow mask that vaguely resembled a feline.

The Hollow currently had a Plus wrapped in one of it's large tentacles as it prepared to eat it but stopped once Ichigo made his presence known. The creature turned it's head to look at the Soul Reaper and dropped the Plus to the groud. It roared loudly before sending one of it's tentacles in Ichigo's direction. To his surprise it streched all the way to where he was standing at an alarming rate and he had to dodge out of the way quickly, barely making it.

the Hollow sent another tentacle in Ichigo's direction and the boy attempted to dodge again, however, his reaction time was worse and the tentacle scraped by his arm. His sleeve ripped open and a small trail of blood trickled out of where the Hollow had made contact.

Ichigo noticed the the Pull-Up he was wearing was imparing his movements, making it hard for him to get around easily. It was at that time that Ichigo heard a shuffling to his left, someone else was there.
1553321111111.title: A Hollow attacks!

choices: Kisuke brings Ichigo to his shop
15533211111111.content:
Ichigo looked over in the general area of the sound and to his surprise saw Kisuke Urahara walking up.

"Kisuke? What are you doing out here?" Ichigo asked as he looked over at the blonde-haired man wearing his signature hat, but kept his Zanpakuto pointed towards the Hollow.

"Well, I caught wind of this Hollow on my way back to my shop and I thought I would come take care of it. Looks like you beat me here, eh Ichigo?" Kisuke said moving his cane around as he talked.

Before Ichigo had time to reply to the former Soul Reaper the Hollow lunged at him again. He was able to get out of the way of the tentacle this time and quickly counter attacked, slicing deep into the appendage. The Hollow roared loudly and swung the bloody arm around wildly. Ichigo flash stepped behind the monster and went to take a swing at it, but the Hollow was quicker than it looked, to both Ichigo and Kisuke's surprise it angrily lashed out at Ichigo with it's tail nailing him square in the stomach. The impact sent Ichigo flying into a tree and the blow caused him to release his entire bladder into the training diaper he was wearing.

Ichigo uncomfortably got to his feet and moved to attack the Hollow, but the mess in the thin diaper he had around his waist threw him off and broke his concentration and the Hollow landed another blow on him, sending him to the ground once more.

Kisuke noticed Ichigo's odd movements but assumed he was disoriented from the fall and chose not to do anything, he figured he would dust himself off and move in to finish the Hollow. However, as the fight moved on and Ichigo suffered blow after blow from the beast Kisuke began to worry.

"What are you doing, Ichigo?" Kisuke whispered quietly to himself as he watched the fight painfully go on. It wasn't until the Hollow hit Ichigo across the face and almost knocked him unconscious that Kisuke decided to step in.

Ichigo was exausted and hurting everywhere from the Hollow's punishing blows, he simply couldn't dodge anything in the state he was in. The weakened Soul Reaper gathered together all the strength he could find and swung Zangetsu at the creature one last time as he shouted the words 'Getsuga Tensho!' The blue wave of spirit energy colided with the beast, severing one of it's tentecles. Ichigo, exausted from the fight colapsed to the ground.

Kisuke quickly drew his Zanpakuto out of his cane and dashed over to the Hollow, swinging his blade and finishing it off. As the Hollow disappeared Kisuke went to tend to Ichigo but as he approched him he saw that his injuries were more than he could handle here, so he decided to bring him somewhere else.

"I'm sorry Ichigo, I shouldn't have let it drag on for that long." Kisuke muttered to the unconsious boy as he picked him up and flash-steped away.
15533211111111.title: It's Kisuke

Story 1: Amazon Piggy In Pampers
Based loosely on the episode, "This Little Piggy", where Circe transformed Wonder Woman into a bona fide pig, as well as inspired from the art by Okayokayokok:
https://www.deviantart.com/okayokayokok/...

What if instead of becoming a full-blown swine, Circe's spell was far more specific and heinous, transforming Wonder Woman into a fat anthropomorphic pig version of herself, but now with the added hindrances of being incontinent and now required to wear ludicrously bulky diapers. Oh what a cruel punishment, indeed!

...Well, what do you choose?
